verses.name: Revelation 22:4
verses.text: And they shall see his face; and his name shall be in their foreheads.

verses.name: Revelation 22:5
verses.text: And there shall be no night there; and they need no candle, neither light of the sun; for the Lord God giveth them light: and they shall reign for ever and ever.

verses.name: Revelation 22:6
verses.text: And he said unto me, These sayings are faithful and true: and the Lord God of the holy prophets sent his angel to shew unto his servants the things which must shortly be done.

verses.name: Revelation 22:7
verses.text: Behold, I come quickly: blessed is he that keepeth the sayings of the prophecy of this book.
